languages.text: "Впрочем, есть и другие варианты, богохульные и запретные". {n}Хормейстер кривится.{/n} "Несанкционированные псайкеры. Незащищенные, сломленные души — такие редко живут дольше нескольких сеансов. Но даже они могут сгодиться, приведи Бог-Император суровые испытания на наши души. И, судя по взбесившемуся в последнее время варпу, по количеству смертей астропатов, эти испытания настигнут нас раньше, чем наши молитвы достигнут Терры".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем, есть и другие варианты". {n}Хормейстер кривится от мерзости.{/n} "Несанкционированные псайкеры, Ваша Светлость. Этот бич на лике Империума. Незащищенные, сломленные души — такие редко живут дольше пары сеансов. Но даже такие могут сгодиться, приведи Всевышний суровые испытания на наши души". {n}Долгий, мерный вздох выдает тяжесть последующих слов астропата.{n} "И судя по взбесившемуся в последние месяцы варпу... Судя по количеству смертей астропатов, среди даже моего хора, эти испытания настигнут нас раньше, чем наши молитвы достигнут Терры".

languages.text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, есть и другие варианты, богохульные и запретные". {n}Хормейстер кривится.{/n} "Несанкционированные псайкеры. Незащищенные, сломленные души — такие редко живут дольше нескольких сеансов. Но даже они могут сгодиться, приведи Бог-Император суровые испытания на наши души. И, судя по взбесившемуся в последнее время варпу, по количеству смертей астропатов, эти испытания настигнут нас раньше, чем наши молитвы достигнут Терры".

traits.locale_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers reach Terra."

Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers reach Terra."

And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

"That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

"That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

languages.text: «Dicho eso, existen otras opciones. Opciones blasfemas y prohibidas». {n}El maestro del Coro hace una mueca.{/n} «Psíquicos no autorizados. Almas desprotegidas y quebradas que rara vez sobreviven a sus primeros encargos. Pero incluso ellos nos pueden servir, si el Dios Emperador considera oportuno someternos a tales dificultades. Y a juzgar por la voracidad que presenta la disformidad en tiempos recientes, evidenciada por el número de Astrópatas caídos, esas dificultades llegarán antes de que nuestras plegarias alcancen Terra».
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

traits.locale_text: «Dicho eso, existen otras opciones. Opciones blasfemas y prohibidas». {n}El maestro del Coro hace una mueca.{/n} «Psíquicos no autorizados. Almas desprotegidas y quebradas que rara vez sobreviven a sus primeros encargos. Pero incluso ellos nos pueden servir, si el Dios Emperador considera oportuno someternos a tales dificultades. Y a juzgar por la voracidad que presenta la disformidad en tiempos recientes, evidenciada por el número de Astrópatas caídos, esas dificultades llegarán antes de que nuestras plegarias alcancen Terra».

languages.text: 「とはいえ、他の選択肢もある。神を冒涜するような、禁じられた選択肢がな」{n}クワイアーマスターは、顔をゆがめる。{/n}「非公認の異能者だ。守られもしない壊れかけの魂が、最初の数回の儀式を生き延びることはめったにない。しかし、神帝陛下が我々の魂に厳しい試練を与えてくだされば、そういった者でも生き延びることができるだろう。ここ最近の<歪み>の激しさ、感応通信官の死者数から見て、その試練は、私たちの祈りが地球に届くよりも早く訪れるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

traits.locale_text: 「とはいえ、他の選択肢もある。神を冒涜するような、禁じられた選択肢がな」{n}クワイアーマスターは、顔をゆがめる。{/n}「非公認の異能者だ。守られもしない壊れかけの魂が、最初の数回の儀式を生き延びることはめったにない。しかし、神帝陛下が我々の魂に厳しい試練を与えてくだされば、そういった者でも生き延びることができるだろう。ここ最近の<歪み>の激しさ、感応通信官の死者数から見て、その試練は、私たちの祈りが地球に届くよりも早く訪れるはずだ」

languages.text: “话虽如此，实际上还是有其他选择，比如那些亵渎神明的禁忌之人。”{n}唱诗大师皱起了眉头。{/n}“我指的就是那些非法灵能者。他们的灵魂支离破碎、缺乏保护，绝大部分人几场通讯下来就会一命呜呼。但如果这就是神皇为我们准备的严酷考验，那我们也能接受这样的安排。而且，考虑到亚空间紊乱的程度与星语者的死亡速度，恐怕我们的祈祷抵达泰拉之前，这样的考验就会降临在我们身上。”
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

traits.locale_text: “话虽如此，实际上还是有其他选择，比如那些亵渎神明的禁忌之人。”{n}唱诗大师皱起了眉头。{/n}“我指的就是那些非法灵能者。他们的灵魂支离破碎、缺乏保护，绝大部分人几场通讯下来就会一命呜呼。但如果这就是神皇为我们准备的严酷考验，那我们也能接受这样的安排。而且，考虑到亚空间紊乱的程度与星语者的死亡速度，恐怕我们的祈祷抵达泰拉之前，这样的考验就会降临在我们身上。”

languages.text: "Es gibt aber auch andere Optionen. Blasphemische, verbotene Optionen." {n}Der Chormeister verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Unsanktionierte Psioniker. Ungeschützte, gebrochene Seelen, die nur selten ihre ersten paar Seancen überleben. Doch selbst jene wären ausreichend, sollte der Gottimperator unsere Seelen sehr strengen Prüfungen unterziehen. Und wenn man bedenkt, wie wild der Warp in letzter Zeit ist, der Zahl toter Astropathen nach zu urteilen, stehen uns diese Prüfungen schneller bevor als unsere Gebete Terra erreichen könnten."
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt aber auch andere Optionen. Blasphemische, verbotene Optionen." {n}Der Chormeister verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Unsanktionierte Psioniker. Ungeschützte, gebrochene Seelen, die nur selten ihre ersten paar Seancen überleben. Doch selbst jene wären ausreichend, sollte der Gottimperator unsere Seelen sehr strengen Prüfungen unterziehen. Und wenn man bedenkt, wie wild der Warp in letzter Zeit ist, der Zahl toter Astropathen nach zu urteilen, stehen uns diese Prüfungen schneller bevor als unsere Gebete Terra erreichen könnten."

languages.text: « Cela étant dit, il existe d'autres solutions, si blasphématoires et illicites soient-elles, {n}grimace le maître de chœur.{/n} Des psykers non assermentés. Des esprits brisés et sans défense qui survivent rarement à leurs premières séances. Quoi qu'il en soit, si l'Empereur-Dieu en venait à mettre nos âmes à rude épreuve, il faudrait nous en contenter. Et à en juger par l'agressivité du Warp et le nombre d'astropathes que nous avons perdus dernièrement, il y a fort à parier que le sort s'acharne contre nous avant que nos prières aient le temps d'atteindre Terra. »
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."

traits.locale_text: « Cela étant dit, il existe d'autres solutions, si blasphématoires et illicites soient-elles, {n}grimace le maître de chœur.{/n} Des psykers non assermentés. Des esprits brisés et sans défense qui survivent rarement à leurs premières séances. Quoi qu'il en soit, si l'Empereur-Dieu en venait à mettre nos âmes à rude épreuve, il faudrait nous en contenter. Et à en juger par l'agressivité du Warp et le nombre d'astropathes que nous avons perdus dernièrement, il y a fort à parier que le sort s'acharne contre nous avant que nos prières aient le temps d'atteindre Terra. »

languages.text: "Bununla beraber farklı seçenekler de mevcuttur. Dine aykırı, yasaklı seçenekler..." {n}Koro Şefi yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Onaysız ruhsezerler. İlk birkaç seanslarından nadiren sağ çıkan, korumasız ve yoldan çıkmış kimseler. Fakat Tanrı İmparator, olur da ruhlarımızı zorlu imtihanlara tabi tutarsa onlar da iş görür. Ölü Astropat sayısından yola çıkarak öteboyutun son zamanlarda nasıl öfkeli olduğunu göz önünde bulundurursak bu imtihanlar, dualarımızın Terra'ya ulaşmasından çok önce bize hücum eder."
languages.original_text: "That said, there are other options. Blasphemous, forbidden options." {n}The Choirmaster grimaces.{/n} "Unsanctioned psykers. Unprotected and broken souls who seldom live past their first few seances. But even those would do, should the God-Emperor put our souls through severe trials. And judging by how rabid the warp has been of late, by the number of dead Astropaths, those trials will be upon us sooner than our prayers could reach Terra."
